faq.question: How to order transfer or a tour?
faq.answer: It is necessary to specify the place of departure, arrival, date of the tour or transfer, then choose a guide-driver. After that, it will only be necessary to place an order.

faq.question: How to pay?
faq.answer: Payment is made in cash, only after the end of the trip.

faq.question: Can I order multi-day tours?
faq.answer: You can pre-order and plan as many trips as you need at the time of your arrival in Georgia.

faq.question: What language to speak?
faq.answer: You can specify in advance the language in which you will communicate with the guide-driver.
